mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user set del_flag=1 WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT su.id,su.username,su.nickname,su.phone,su.email FROM sys_user su left join sys_user_depart sud on su.id = sud.user_id left join sys_depart sd on sd.id = sud.depart_id WHERE su.del_flag = 0 and su.username like"%"#{username}"%" and su.nickname like concat(concat(#{nickname},'%'),'%') and su.phone like '%${phone}%' and su.email=#{email}
and depart_id=#{departId}

select count(1) from (select * from sys_menu where url = #{url}) sm left join sys_role_menu srm on srm.menu_id = sm.id left join sys_role sr on sr.id = srm.role_id left join sys_user_role sur on sur.role_id = sr.id left join sys_user su on su.id =sur.user_id where su.id = #{userId}
